Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractShape
      • Circle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Shape

    public class Circle
extends AbstractShape
    A Circle is constructed by a center and radius. This class extends AbstractShape class and contains methods that can only be used by shape Circle.
    Version:
    01/19/12
    Author:
    Chun-Wei Chen

      Constructor and Description
      Circle(int x, int y, int r)
      Constructs a Circle centered at (x, y) with radius r.
